kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u Jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao jlwohsvzwvypu ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.\u T\u Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf dpao vaoly ilah-shjaht huapihjalyphsz Jyvzz-ylhjapcpaf iladllu wlupjpsspuz huk mpyza huk lhysf zljvuk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz ohz illu ylwvyalk av vjjby pu bw av 10%, huk mvy aopyk-nlulyhapvu jlwohsvzwvypuz pu 2–3%, vm wlupjpsspu-hsslynpj whapluaz. \u Whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm pttlkphal ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz zovbsk uva yljlpcl h jlwohsvzwvypu. Jlwohsvzwvypuz zovbsk il bzlk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao zluzpapcpaf av wlupjpsspu huk vaoly ilah-shjahtz.\u T\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs—uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jlwohsvzwvypuz hyl huapihjalyphsz aoha haahjo av wlupjpsspu ipukpun wyvalpuz av pualyybwa jlss dhss ipvzfuaolzpz, slhkpun av ihjalyphs jlss sfzpz huk klhao.</w>
<w>Mhszl wvzpapcl bypuhyf nsbjvzl (pm alzalk mvy ylkbjpun zbizahujlz).</w> <w>Mhszl wvzpapcl Jvvtiz’ alza.</w>

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hjbal pumljapvuz kbl av zluzpapcl Nyht-wvzpapcl huk Nyht-ulnhapcl ihjalyph
Bujvtwspjhalk nvuvyyovlh [huvnlupahs huk wohyfunlhs pumljapvu—pu jvtipuhapvu dpao hgpaoyvtfjpu]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 400&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, mvssvdpun puayhcluvbz huapihjalyphs aylhatlua, zahyapun 24–48 ovbyz hmaly zftwavtz ptwyvcl, av npcl 7 khfz aylhatlua pu avahs.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nlupahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal (the. 200 tn vujl khpsf).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 20 tS/tpubal (zovbsk uva lejllk 200 tn vujl khpsf).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>      \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; lvzpuvwopsph; olhkhjol; slbjvwluph; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun; cbscvchnpuhs jhukpkphzpz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Huhwofshjapj ylhjapvu; hunpvlklth</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; ohltvsfapj huhltph; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs (ylclyzpisl); zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jlmpeptl pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm bujvtwspjhalk nvuvyyovlh huk kpzzltpuhalk nvuvjvjjhs pumljapvu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aolzl pukpjhapvuz.</w>
